title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees
goal: Help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to the features and benefits of Microsoft Teams for remote tech employees.

sections.title: Navigating the Interface
sections.description: Learn how to navigate through different sections of Microsoft Teams interface.

sections.title: Using Chat for Instant Messaging
sections.description: How to use chat for instant messaging and group conversations.

sections.title: Customizing Chat Settings
sections.description: Adjusting settings such as notifications, themes, and privacy options in chat.

sections.title: Scheduling and Joining Meetings
sections.description: Steps to schedule meetings and join them from the calendar or directly through Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Using Meeting Features
sections.description: Exploring features like screen sharing, recording, and virtual backgrounds in meetings.

sections.title: Working with Channels and Tabs
sections.description: Using OneNote and other productivity tools integrated into Microsoft Teams.
